00029 // The AU formats we care about
00030 enum {
00031    AU_SAMPLE_FORMAT_16 = 3,
00032    AU_SAMPLE_FORMAT_24 = 4,
00033    AU_SAMPLE_FORMAT_FLOAT = 6,
00034 };
00035 
00036 typedef struct {
00037    wxUint32 magic;      // magic number
00038    wxUint32 dataOffset; // byte offset to start of audio data
00039    wxUint32 dataSize;   // data length, in bytes (optional)
00040    wxUint32 encoding;   // data encoding enumeration
00041    wxUint32 sampleRate; // samples per second
00042    wxUint32 channels;   // number of interleaved channels
00043 } auHeader;
